moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

moves.name: Rage
moves.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.description: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target's Speed by preventing its movement.

moves.name: Stealth Rock
moves.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opponent's team. The trap hurts opponents that switch into battle.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

moves.name: Smack Down
moves.description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

moves.name: Sand Tomb
moves.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
